about.name: AI integration feature
about.description: Upcoming game-changing feature for Shopify SEO at scale

acceptedAnswer.text: The entire framework has been upgraded in preparation for new features. While no new features are included now, performance and security have been improved significantly.
An AI integration feature that is game changing for Shopify SEO at scale is currently being developed and should be deployed in the next few weeks.

mainEntity.name: What You Need To Do To Upgrade?

acceptedAnswer.text: When you next access the app from your Shopify dashboard, you'll be asked to re-authorize/approve the app, then continue using on your existing plan uninterrupted.

mainEntity.name: What To Do If You Run In Problems?

acceptedAnswer.text: Email team@optizenapp.com for questions and support.

@graph.name: Re-authorize
@graph.description: Process of granting permission again to the app to access your Shopify store
